main.name: Asif Haider Khan
main.description: Full Stack Developer, also good with Django, Laravel, DevOps and IoT
main.bio: I am Asif Haider Khan, I'm a Full Stack Developer. Currently I'm working at a start up called Dokane Dokane Ad (DDAD), a subsidiary of The Boring Platform, where we work on Digitizing Out of Home Advertising in Bangladesh
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, or if you want me to do a project.

resume.skillmessage: I am currently better at the front end than at the back end, but I am quickly catching up.

education.degree: B.Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: In Charge of Full Stack Software Development, DevOps and IoT

projects.title: TestBlog
projects.category: TestBlog built with Django Rest Framework, PostgreSQL, ReactJS, Material-UI

testimonials.text: I believe you have to be willing to be misunderstood if you’re going to innovate.
If at first the idea is not absurd, then there is no hope for it.
